title: Game-Based VR Simulation Education for STEAM Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science and mathematics concepts, along with digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: VR environment construction utilizing personal devices (BYOD), with performance measurement through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Students can apply convergent thinking (STEAM) in the scientific problem-solving process through game mechanics.
Learners can create innovative prototypes using engineering design principles in a VR simulation environment.
Participants can generate communication outputs combining data analysis and artistic expression in game-based projects.

resources: STEAM VR content packages for education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
